item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货上涨，美联储主席鲍威尔的讲话令人期待
item.description: 由于原油和金属价格上涨，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周五上涨，而投资者则在等待美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔当天晚些时候的讲话。【原文：Futures linked to Canada's main stock index rose on Friday as crude and metal prices gained, while investors awaited U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's address later in the day.】

item.title: 电池主管告诉美国联邦科学院：大众汽车的电池目标并非 "一成不变
item.description: 大众汽车公司电池主管周五告诉德国《金融时报》，该公司到2030年建设200千兆瓦时电池产能的目标并非 "一成不变"，该公司将密切关注电动汽车（EV）需求的发展。【原文：Volkswagen's goal of building 200 gigawatt hours of battery capacity by 2030 is not "set in stone" and the carmaker will monitor how demand for electric vehicles (EVs) develops, its batteries chief told German newspaper FAS on Friday.】

item.title: 雀巢首席执行官施耐德因公司业绩不佳而下台 - 三位消息人士
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，雀巢首席执行官马克-施耐德（Mark Schneider）因集团业绩不佳而被这家全球最大的食品制造商突然解雇。【原文：Nestle CEO Mark Schneider was ousted in a sudden move by the world's biggest foodmaker as a result of the group's underperformance, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: Hugo Boss 股东 Frasers 申请购买更多股份
item.description: 据路透社周五看到的一份提交给德国竞争管理机构的文件显示，Hugo Boss 的第二大股东、英国体育和时装零售商 Frasers 已申请收购这家德国公司的更多股份。【原文：Hugo Boss' second-biggest shareholder, British sports and fashion retailer Frasers , has filed a request to acquire more shares in the German company, according to a filing with the German competition authority seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行放弃伦敦金属交易所环形交易会员资格
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所（LME）周五表示，法国兴业银行（Societe Generale International）从 8 月 27 日起将不再是该交易所的环形交易会员。【原文：Societe Generale International will no longer be a ring-dealing member of the London Metal Exchange (LME) as of Aug. 27, the exchange said on Friday.】

item.title: 哈利伯顿公司证实某些系统遭到网络攻击
item.description: 油田服务公司哈里伯顿（Halliburton）周五表示，有未经授权的第三方进入了该公司的某些系统。【原文：Oilfield services firm Halliburton said on Friday that an unauthorized third party had gained access to certain of its systems.】

item.title: 受降息押注和经济增长担忧缓解影响，美国股票基金吸引大量资金流入
item.description: 在截至8月21日的七天里，美国股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，这主要是受到对美联储9月份降息的押注以及对经济增长可能下滑的担忧缓解的推动。【原文：U.S. equity funds attracted significant inflows in the seven days to Aug. 21, bolstered by bets of a Federal Reserve rate cut in September and easing worries about a potential downturn in economic growth.】

item.title: 杂货店增加政治捐款，民主党人也不甘示弱
item.description: 路透社对联邦选举委员会（Federal Election Commission）数据的分析表明，在本轮国会选举中，民主党议员从大型食品公司获得的政治捐款水平有所上升，尽管许多民主党议员指责美国顶级食品连锁店及其供应商以消费者为代价抬高价格。【原文：The level of political donations from major food companies accepted by Democratic lawmakers has ticked higher this congressional election cycle, even as many Democrats have accused the top U.S. grocery chains and their suppliers of pushing prices higher at consumers' expense, a Reuters analysis of Federal Election Commission data shows.】

item.title: 马斯克的 SpaceX 公司在危险的太空行走中测试突破性技术
item.description: SpaceX 下周将尝试首次私人太空行走，这将是对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空公司迄今为止最冒险的任务之一--包括超薄宇航服和无气闸舱在内的开创性设备的一次测试。【原文：SpaceX's attempt at the first ever private spacewalk next week will be a test of trailblazing equipment, including slim spacesuits and a cabin with no airlock, in one of the riskiest missions yet for Elon Musk's space company.】

item.title: 早间竞价：鲍威尔发表讲话，美元陷入困境
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 全球股票基金因美联储降息希望而大幅流入
item.description: 在截至8月21日的一周内，全球投资者受到美联储9月降息预期和美国经济担忧缓解的鼓舞，纷纷将资金投入股票基金。【原文：Global investors ploughed money into equity funds in the week to Aug. 21, encouraged by expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut in September and easing concerns about the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 鲍威尔将成为杰克逊霍尔会议的焦点，期货价格坚挺
item.description: 美国股指期货周五走高，投资者在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔经济研讨会上的讲话，以寻找全球最大经济体降息的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Friday with investors awaiting Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's comments at the Jackson Hole Economic Symposium for clues on interest-rate cuts in the world's biggest economy.】

item.title: 消息人士称，CVC、DSV 为德国铁路申克公司提交了约 1560 亿美元的最终出价
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，德国铁路的物流部门全球国际货运已收到由 CVC Capital Partners 和丹麦运输公司 DSV 牵头的财团的最终出价，该财团对该业务的估值约为 140 亿欧元（约合 155.7 亿美元）。【原文：Deutsche Bahn's logistics unit Schenker has collected final bids from a consortium led by CVC Capital Partners and Danish transport firm DSV that value the business at around 14 billion euros ($15.57 billion), two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 人类学家称加州人工智能法案可能利大于弊
item.description: Anthropic 公司周四表示，加利福尼亚州修订法案，旨在规范人工智能在该州的开发和部署，其好处可能大于成本。【原文：The benefits of California's revised bill that seeks to regulate how artificial intelligence is developed and deployed in the state likely outweigh the costs, Anthropic said on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛退出引发对 JD.com 未来的质疑
item.description: 在中国电子商务市场停滞不前、价格战愈演愈烈以及最大股东沃尔玛撤离的情况下，电子商务零售商 JD.com 需要让投资者相信它的重要性。【原文：E-commerce retailer JD.com needs to convince investors of its relevance amid a stagnant Chinese e-commerce market, aggressive price war and now, the departure of Walmart, its biggest shareholder.】

item.title: 在与人民币熊市搏斗之后，中国现在热衷于避免货币大幅升值
item.description: 中国央行花了整整一年的时间试图为暴跌的人民币筑底，现在却突然面临着相反的问题，转而采用一些微妙的方法来阻止人民币大幅升值。【原文：Having spent all year trying to put a floor under the tumbling yuan, China's central bank is suddenly faced with the opposite problem and is turning to subtle ways to stop the currency from appreciating sharply.】

item.title: 美联储降息前投资者抢购货币市场基金，美国银行称
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周五表示，截至本周三的一周内，投资者向类似现金的货币市场基金（MMF）投入了370亿美元，因为他们在为美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）9月份降息做准备。【原文：Investors poured $37 billion into cash-like money market funds (MMFs) in the week to Wednesday, Bank of America said on Friday, as they braced for the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates in September.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Tabcorp 因违反维多利亚州赌博法规被罚款
item.description: 澳大利亚维多利亚州赌博与赌场管制委员会周五表示，澳大利亚博彩公司 Tabcorp 因在 2020 年至 2023 年期间多次违反预防赌博危害法而被罚款 430 万澳元（289 万美元）。【原文：Australian wagering business Tabcorp has been fined A$4.3 million ($2.89 million) for repeated breaches of gambling harm prevention laws between 2020 and 2023, the Victorian Gambling and Casino Control Commission said on Friday.】

item.title: CBA 下调新借款人利率再次引发对抵押贷款战争的担忧
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚最大的贷款机构澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）下调了部分面向新客户的住房贷款产品的利率，引发了人们对当地房贷市场激烈竞争的担忧。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia , the country's biggest lender, cut interest rates for some of its home loan products for new customers on Friday, stoking fears of spurring intense competition in the local mortgage market.】

item.title: 雀巢公司首席执行官突然离职，股价面临压力
item.description: 雀巢公司首席执行官马克-施耐德（Mark Schneider）突然从这家全球最大的食品制造商离职，由公司资深人士洛朗-弗莱克西（Laurent Freixe）接任，预计周五早盘雀巢股价将下跌。【原文：Nestle shares were expected to fall early on Friday following the abrupt departure of CEO Mark Schneider from the world's biggest foodmaker and his replacement by company veteran Laurent Freixe.】

item.title: 新加坡 7 月核心通胀率同比 2.5%，为两年多来最低
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，新加坡7月份的主要消费者物价指数同比上涨2.5%，为2022年2月以来的最小涨幅。【原文：Singapore's key consumer price gauge rose 2.5% in July from a year earlier, the smallest increase since February 2022, official data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道航空公司飞越阿富汗，因为中东地区风险更大
item.description: 新加坡航空公司、英国航空公司和汉莎航空公司在多年来基本避开阿富汗之后，现在中东冲突使阿富汗似乎成为一个相对安全的选择，因此它们增加了飞越阿富汗的航班。【原文：Singapore Airlines, British Airways and Lufthansa have increased their flights over Afghanistan after years of largely avoiding it now the Middle East conflict has made it seem a relatively safe option.】

item.title: 鲍威尔手握美联储中枢，可能会在杰克逊霍尔选择一刀切的做法
item.description: 美国经济数据为美联储降息开了绿灯，金融市场也为首次降息行动做好了准备。周三，美联储7月份会议的报告显示，"绝大多数 "决策者同意宽松政策可能在下个月开始，这几乎宣告了美联储的降息行动已经开始。【原文：U.S. economic data is giving the Federal Reserve the green light to cut interest rates, financial markets are aligned for the first move, and the central bank all but gave the game away on Wednesday when a readout of its July meeting showed a "vast majority" of policymakers agreed the policy easing likely would begin next month.】

item.title: 加拿大车队工会称加拿大国家铁路公司工人将于周五返回工作岗位
item.description: 加拿大卡车司机工会（Teamsters Canada）表示，加拿大国家铁路公司（Canadian National Railway）工人的停工期结束后，将于周五返回工作岗位。【原文：Workers at Canadian National Railway will return to work on Friday, the Teamsters Canada union said, after their lockout at the company ended.】

item.title: 欧洲 日本央行上田支持日元。下一步，鲍威尔
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 中国机器人制造商追赶特斯拉，以提供仿人工人
item.description: 中国主导着电动汽车市场。现在，中国正在追赶特斯拉，竞相制造由电池驱动的人形机器人，以取代在装配线上制造电动汽车的人类工人。【原文：China dominates the market for electric vehicles. Now it's chasing Tesla in the race to build battery-powered humanoids expected to replace human workers building EVs on assembly lines.】

item.title: 东京 8 月通胀率保持不变，结束了连续 3 个月的加速趋势
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，8月份日本首都东京的消费价格通胀率预计将保持不变，结束连续三个月的加速增长，这表明日本央行可能不会急于加息。【原文：Consumer price inflation is expected to stay unchanged in Japan's capital Tokyo in August, ending three months of acceleration, a Reuters poll showed, suggesting the central bank may not be in a rush to hike rates.】

item.title: 新加坡银行认为中东在 3 至 5 年内将占资产总额的五分之一
item.description: 新加坡银行（Bank of Singapore）高层表示，该行的目标是在未来三到五年内发展中东地区的业务，使该地区在其整体收入和私人银行资产中所占的比例从目前的 10%左右提高到 20%。【原文：Bank of Singapore aims to grow its business in the Middle East with the region contributing up to 20% of its overall revenue and private banking assets over the next three to five years from around 10% currently, its top executive said.】

item.title: 通过云计算获取美国限制技术的中国实体名单
item.description: 最近的公开招标文件显示，与国家有关的中国实体正在使用亚马逊或其竞争对手提供的云服务，以获取他们无法以其他方式获得的先进美国芯片和人工智能能力。【原文：State-linked Chinese entities are using cloud services provided by Amazon or its rivals to access advanced U.S. chips and artificial intelligence capabilities that they cannot acquire otherwise, recent public tender documents showed.】

item.title: 独家报道：中国实体转向亚马逊云及其竞争对手，以获取美国高端芯片和人工智能
item.description: 最近的公开招标文件显示，与国家有关的中国实体正在使用亚马逊或其竞争对手提供的云服务，以获取他们无法以其他方式获得的先进美国芯片和人工智能能力。【原文：State-linked Chinese entities are using cloud services provided by Amazon or its rivals to access advanced U.S. chips and artificial intelligence capabilities that they cannot acquire otherwise, recent public tender documents showed.】
